print('\t\t\t BMI (Body Mass Index) Calculator')
print('\t\t\t By Irfan Ahmed\n\n')

name = input('Enter Your Name :')
age = int(input('Enter Your Age :'))
weight = int(input('What is your Weight in KG : '))

height = float(input('What is your Height in Feet/Inches (i e  5.6) : '))
height = ((height/3.282)**2)# covert feet to meter 

bmi = (weight/height) 

print("%.2f" % bmi)

if bmi <= 18.5:
    print('\n Your BMI is', ("%.2f" % bmi),'Which means you are "Underweight".')

elif bmi > 18.5 and bmi < 25:
    print('\n Your BMI is', ("%.2f" % bmi),'Which means you are "Normal".')

elif bmi > 25 and bmi < 30:
    print('\n Your BMI is', ("%.2f" % bmi),'Which means you are "Overweight".')

elif bmi > 30:
    print('\n Your BMI is', ("%.2f" % bmi),'Which means you are "Obese".')

else:
    print('There is an error with your input')
